sources.name: Movies
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Movies

sinks.name: Output
sinks.script:
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		Tomato,
		NewRating
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	partitionFileNames:['movies.csv']) ~> Output

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.script:
Movies select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		Tomato = {Rotton Tomato}
	))~> Select1

sources.name: SQLProduct
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> SQLProduct

sources.name: ProductForSales
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		{_Inserted} as timestamp,
		{_LastUpdated} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> ProductForSales

sinks.name: MergeDW
sinks.script:
SetFields sink(input(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		{_Inserted} as timestamp,
		{_LastUpdated} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ProductID'],
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		{_Inserted} = insertdate,
		{_LastUpdated} = ModifiedDate
	)) ~> MergeDW

transformations.name: FindChangedRows
transformations.script:
SQLProduct, ProductForSales exists(SQLProduct@Name == ProductForSales@Name
	&& SQLProduct@ProductNumber == ProductForSales@ProductNumber
	&& SQLProduct@StandardCost == ProductForSales@StandardCost
	&& SQLProduct@ListPrice == ProductForSales@ListPrice,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> FindChangedRows

transformations.name: SetFields
transformations.script:
UpsertRows derive(ModifiedDate = currentDate(),
		insertdate = currentDate()) ~> SetFields

sources.name: TripData
sources.script:
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		rate_code as string,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		dropoff_datetime as string,
		passenger_count as integer,
		trip_time_in_secs as integer,
		trip_distance as integer,
		pickup_longitude as string,
		pickup_latitude as string,
		dropoff_longitude as string,
		dropoff_latitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> TripData

sources.name: TripFare
sources.script:
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		{ hack_license} as string,
		{ vendor_id} as string,
		{ pickup_datetime} as string,
		{ payment_type} as string,
		{ fare_amount} as double,
		{ surcharge} as double,
		{ mta_tax} as double,
		{ tip_amount} as double,
		{ tolls_amount} as double,
		{ total_amount} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> TripFare

sinks.name: VendorStatsSink
sinks.script:
AggregateVendorStats sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> VendorStatsSink

sinks.name: DayStatsSink
sinks.script:
AggregateDayStats sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DayStatsSink

sinks.name: TotalPaymentByPaymentType
sinks.script:
AggregateByPaymentType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> TotalPaymentByPaymentType

transformations.name: JoinMatchedData
AggregateVendorStats
transformations.script:
JoinMatchedData aggregate(groupBy(vendor_id),
	passenger_count = round(sum(passenger_count),2),
		trip_time_in_secs = round(sum(trip_time_in_secs)/60,2),
		trip_distance = round(sum(trip_distance),2),
		TotalTripFare = round(sum({ total_amount}), 2)) ~> AggregateVendorStats

transformations.name: AggregateDayStats
transformations.script:
JoinMatchedData aggregate(groupBy(DayOfTheWeek = dayOfWeek(toDate(pickup_datetime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss'))),
	trip_distance = round(avg(trip_distance),2),
		passenger_count = round(avg(passenger_count),2),
		trip_time_in_secs = round(avg(trip_time_in_secs)/60,2),
		average_fare = round(avg({ total_amount}), 2)) ~> AggregateDayStats

transformations.name: AggregateByPaymentType
transformations.script:
TripFare aggregate(groupBy({ payment_type}),
	each(match(type=='double'), concat($$, '_total') = round(sum ($$)))) ~> AggregateByPaymentType

sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		{_Inserted} as timestamp,
		{_LastUpdated} as timestamp,
		DWhash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		{_Inserted} as timestamp,
		{_LastUpdated} as timestamp,
		DWhash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ProductID']) ~> sink1

sources.name: SQLProdStageWithHash
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		{_Inserted} as timestamp,
		{_LastUpdated} as timestamp,
		DWhash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> SQLProdStageWithHash

sources.name: SQLProdNoHash
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> SQLProdNoHash

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
AlterRows sink(input(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		{_Inserted} as timestamp,
		{_LastUpdated} as timestamp,
		DWhash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ProductID'],
	mapColumn(
		ProductID = SQLProdNoHash@ProductID,
		Name = SQLProdNoHash@Name,
		ProductNumber = SQLProdNoHash@ProductNumber,
		Color = SQLProdNoHash@Color,
		StandardCost = SQLProdNoHash@StandardCost,
		ListPrice = SQLProdNoHash@ListPrice,
		{_Inserted} = Inserted,
		{_LastUpdated} = Updated,
		DWhash = CreateHash@DWhash
	)) ~> sink1

transformations.name: Exists
transformations.script:
CreateHash, SQLProdStageWithHash exists(CreateHash@DWhash == SQLProdStageWithHash@DWhash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exists

transformations.name: SetAttributes
transformations.script:
LookupDates derive(Inserted = iif (isNull({_Inserted}),currentTimestamp(),{_Inserted}),
		Updated = iif (isNull({_LastUpdated}),currentTimestamp(),{_LastUpdated})) ~> SetAttributes

transformations.name: LookupDates
transformations.script:
Exists, SQLProdStageWithHash lookup(SQLProdNoHash@ProductID == SQLProdStageWithHash@ProductID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupDates
